markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Merfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=761)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

These aquatic humanoids have an upper body similar to a human and a lower body similar to a fish.
name: Merfolk
